revised_title: Nonlinear Diffraction and Caustic Formation: A New Family of Symmetries
tldr: This article presents a new family of symmetries for the Zabolotskaya-Khokhlov equation, which describes the behavior of nonlinear acoustic waves. The study also provides exact solutions for the equation and discusses the implications of these symmetries on other work in the field. Additionally, the formation of line caustics is examined using the exact solutions, leading to new results in nonlinear acoustics.
